lead_paragraph: BAUMANN--Andrea. On July 7, Andrea Baumann born Lilienfeld-Lechesne, passed away in her home in Ardsley on Hudson, aged 94. Born in Dresden in 1922 to Violette Lechesne and Karl Lilienfeld, she grew up in Berlin and in 1939 moved to New York. In 1941 she married Edouard Baumann (1906-99). They lived in Paris (1961-71), in Morges, Switzerland (1972-96) and New York (1996). The last ten years Andrea lived in Ardsley on Hudson, NY. She is survived by her loving daughter Bettina and son-in-law, Tom Speyer. A memorial will be held at the Irvington Presbyterian Church on Saturday, July 30th at 11am. Funeral will be at the cemetery of Huemoz in Switzerland in October. 1/3
